001package io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.spring;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.framework.annotation.FrameworkAdapter;
004import java.util.Arrays;
005import java.util.List;
006import java.util.Set;
007import org.springframework.core.annotation.AnnotatedElementUtils;
008import org.springframework.lang.NonNull;
009import org.springframework.lang.Nullable;
010import org.springframework.test.context.ContextConfigurationAttributes;
011import org.springframework.test.context.ContextCustomizer;
012import org.springframework.test.context.ContextCustomizerFactory;
013
014/**
015 * A factory for creating {@link ContextCustomizer} instances based on {@code @FrameworkAdapter} annotations.
016 *
017 * <p>This class scans the test class for any {@link FrameworkAdapter} annotations, collects their specified base
018 * packages, and constructs a {@link FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizer} to add those packages to the Spring context
019 * scan. If no {@code @FrameworkAdapter} annotations are present, it returns {@code null}, indicating that no
020 * customization is needed.
021 *
022 * <p>This approach allows for flexible configuration of additional base packages without modifying the default Spring
023 * context setup.
024 *
025 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
026 */
027public class FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizerFactory implements ContextCustomizerFactory {
028
029   /**
030    * Creates a new {@link ContextCustomizer} if the test class contains one or more {@link FrameworkAdapter}
031    * annotations.
032    *
033    * <p>Each adapter's base packages are gathered and combined, ensuring duplicates are removed before creating
034    * the resulting customizer.
035    *
036    * @param testClass        The test class to inspect for {@code @FrameworkAdapter} annotations.
037    * @param configAttributes The context configuration attributes (not used in this implementation).
038    * @return A {@link FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizer} if any {@code @FrameworkAdapter} annotations are found,
039    *     otherwise {@code null}.
040    */
041   @Override
042   public ContextCustomizer createContextCustomizer(
043         @NonNull Class<?> testClass,
044         @Nullable List<ContextConfigurationAttributes> configAttributes) {
045
046      Set<FrameworkAdapter> annotations = AnnotatedElementUtils.findAllMergedAnnotations(testClass,
047            FrameworkAdapter.class);
048
049      if (annotations.isEmpty()) {
050         return null;
051      }
052
053      return new FrameworkAdapterContextCustomizer(annotations.stream()
054            .flatMap(adapter -> Arrays.stream(adapter.basePackages()))
055            .distinct().toArray(String[]::new));
056   }
057
058}
